messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Helping others to unschool
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/9/03 8:07:48 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... This sums it all up. Terrific. *~*Elissa Jill*~* unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/9/03 8:07:48 AM Eastern Standard Time,
fetteroll@... writes:

> >Unschooling is an ideal, something we
> >work toward with different levels of purity and success.
>
> And those who are *willing* to stop part way can't help others who would
> like to reach the ideal.
>
>
This sums it all up.
Terrific.

*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
